XWS-Security 1.0 EA3 (Early Access)

Packages
com.sun.xml.rpc.security This package provides APIs for XML and Web Services Security (xws-security).
com.sun.xml.wss This package provides the core API for manipulating SOAP messages in accordance to the OASIS Web Service Security (WSS) specification.
